At O'Reilly we take those issues very seriously. While we're still trying to understand exactly what might have happened at Oscon or other O'Reilly conferences in the past, it's become clear that this is a real, long-standing issue in the... item.description: Militants hang 8-year-old boy in southern Afghanistan http://dlvr.it/cPS7P #teamfollowback
item.content:encoded: Militants hang 8-year-old boy in southern Afghanistan http://dlvr.it/cPS7P #teamfollowback An 8 year-old boy was hanged by militants in Afghanistan's Helmand province after the boy's father -- a police officer in the southern city of Gereshk -- refused to comply with militants' demands to provide them with a police vehicle, officials said. Link - Trackbacks

item.content:encoded: Google Plus Has A Problem. Fear Not: I Have A Solution http://tcrn.ch/rhBBGu by @rezendi Google Plus is terrific. I don’t think it will ever be more than the Pepsi to Facebook’s Coke, alas, but it’s much slicker and better designed. It’s too bad that the service has sacrificed a pile of goodwill over the last week by repeatedly publicly shooting themselves in the foot. Link - Trackbacks

item.title: #fuckyouwashington « BuzzMachine
item.description: My blog post about the saga of #fuckyouwashington, so far: http://bit.ly/o4gcIV
item.content:encoded: My blog post about the saga of #fuckyouwashington, so far: http://bit.ly/o4gcIV So I was angry. Watching TV news over dinner — turning my attention from scandals in the UK to those here and frankly welcoming the distraction from the tragedies in Norway — I listened to the latest from Washington about negotiations over the debt ceiling. It pissed me off. I’d had enough. After dinner, I tweeted: “Hey, Washington assholes, it’s our country, our economy, our money. Stop fucking with it.” It was the pinot talking (sounding more like a zinfandel). Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: buzzmachine.com
